prompts.prompt: List all my available MCP servers and show the number of prompts and resources for each.

template.name: list-my-servers
template.description: Gives an overview of all MCP servers the user has access to, including counts of prompts and resources.

prompts.prompt: Add the resource {uri} to my server named {server}. The resource name is {name}.

template.name: add-resource-to-server
template.description: Adds a resource to one of the user's servers using its URI and name.

arguments.name: server
arguments.description: The name of the MCP server

prompts.prompt: Create a new MCP server named {server}.

template.name: create-mcp-server
template.description: Creates a new MCP server instance with the specified name.

arguments.name: server
arguments.description: The name of the new server

prompts.prompt: Update the prompt named {promptName} on server {server} with this new text: {newText}.

template.name: update-server-prompt
template.description: Updates the text of an existing prompt on a given server.

arguments.name: server
arguments.description: The name of the MCP server

arguments.name: promptName
arguments.description: The name of the prompt to update

prompts.prompt: Delete the resource named {resourceName} from server {server}.

template.name: delete-resource
template.description: Deletes a specific resource from a given MCP server.

arguments.name: server
arguments.description: The name of the MCP server

arguments.name: resourceName
arguments.description: The name of the resource to delete
